dmca.title: Shopforphones Seeks Removal of Mobile Phone Description (#3)
dmca.body:
[redacted]
[redacted]
Goldington Green
Bedford
MK41 0AA
UK

4th November 2004

Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints 
[redacted]
Mountain View, CA 94043

Dear Sir or Madam,

1. The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on several pages:
a. http://www.shopforphones.co.uk/orange-spv-m2000.htm
b. http://www.shopforphones.co.uk/orange-spv-m1000.htm

2. The search query and web pages with the unauthorized material are:
a. Search Query: ORANGE SPV M2000 Infringing Web Page: http://shop.uplands.co.uk/acatalog/Orange_SPVM2000.html
b. Search Query: ORANGE SPV M1000 Infringing Web Page: http://shop.uplands.co.uk/acatalog/Mobile_New_Connections.html (page section entitled "SPV M1000 on Orange Sharer tariff")

3. My contact information: [redacted]@dynamoo.com

4. Infringer's Contact Information: Uplands Mobiles Ltd, [redacted], Swansea, SA1 4NE, United Kingdom. Email: [redacted]@uplands.co.uk; Fax:[redacted]

5. I, [redacted], have in good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Note that the infringer has been given a warning by email and over the telephone to remove all such material in the past but has not done so.
[redacted], Site Owner, shopforphones. co.uk
Phone:[redacted]
Fax:[redacted]
Email:[redacted]@dynamoo.com
